授業目的:
To examine theoretical and concrete issues in the field of multicultural society in relation to globalization
To understand the current social movement called globalization
To analyze and problematize the various issued in intercultural understating
To examine and to be able to explain the key concepts and the problems of multicultural societies in your own context
到達目標:
To examine and to be able to explain the key concepts and the problems of multicultural societies.
To analyze and problematize the various issues in education for intercultural understanding.
授業方法:
この科目は申込科目です。
Students need to pre-apply for the course.

第2回: Globalization in the economic & political sphere
トピック.授業外学習2:
Students are required to read assigned readings and to prepare to express their own understandings and opinions towards the issues in class.
It takes approximately one hour and the assignments are checked and evaluated in the class.

評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
Each course is positioned within the curriculum in accordance with the diploma policy and curriculum policy established by each undergraduate/graduate school. 
By proceeding with the study of this course with an awareness of the DP and CP, the following abilities expected by each undergraduate/graduate school will be developed.
Global Studies:
1. Understanding and analytical skills regarding international issues: the ability to understand and analyze various regions of the world from different perspectives in the humanities and social sciences.
2. Problem-solving skills: the ability to proactively identify problems and solve them based on appropriate methods.
3. Intercultural understanding and multicultural coexistence: the ability to be sensitive to different cultures and to coexist with diverse cultures.
